title: Gnar skin concept void gnar
body:
I think riot should add this skin for ganr becasue it fits well into his sort of "character" and vel'koz and bruam got a skin so gnar is next right? any ways this skin looks amazing and should be given to gnar as well as some other skin concepts floating around the league community like toy soilder azit or gardian of the sands rek'sai.http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/3LviKrgu-skin-batches?show=flat this is the original author to be given credit all i did was zoom in on his gnar concept gj to this guy



                                                         Upvote if you think this should be a skin {{champion:150}} is waiting for his skin riot...

replies.body:
Someone else posted this with a series of other skins like spirit gnar, toy soldier azir and more.. 

You should probably give credit where credit is due. to the original poster/creator of those skins..
I don't know who the original author is but this image has been floating around the internet for a while and who ever the unknown author is he did a good job

> [{quoted}](name=MonsterMan007,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mlkumggI,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-19T15:27:37.400+0000)
>
> I don't know who the original author is but this image has been floating around the internet for a while and who ever the unknown author is he did a good job

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/3LviKrgu-skin-batches?show=flat
the thread is on the first page of the skins concepts boards
Mini Gnar still looks adorable. I approve. :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mlkumggI,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-19T23:17:29.026+0000)
>
> Mini Gnar still looks adorable. I approve. :3

if you managed to make this a skin ms rioteer iit would be a great skin for gnar and an amazing skin in gerneral
\*Ms Rioter

its...
its...
Reksai's baby O_O

> [{quoted}](name=LuciferDraco,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mlkumggI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-19T13:57:04.814+0000)
>
> its...
> its...
> Reksai's baby O_O

i'd image how awful it be to birth that monstrosity
what if he mega formed during the birth? it would be a mess...
Wow....now you've got my head spinning around, thank god we never had to hear about Gnar's birth lore-wise. Amirite?
Its...its...
Please make this a skin, he really lacks them

To whoever drew that and/or modeled it (it looks like they actually modeled it and rendered it) then that looks just like most of the void skins, and I just have one thing to say...

RITO PLZ LET US HAVE THIS.

Also, if what Onastacia said is true, please, give credit to the artist.
I LOVE GNAR !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! sorter ce skin trop choupi
good idea
Every lane should have a void skin concept, and don't tell me nocturne has a void skin, that thing is seriously outdated.

> [{quoted}](name=SacredShadow67,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mlkumggI,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-05-06T16:22:00.903+0000)
>
> I WANT

If you want it share the post around and raise some awareness! :D

I think it looks great its a darker gnar but.... he is still cute hahaha I love it. I vote yes or put support behind it whatever has to been done to make it a reality and not just a dream. Also great work to the artist.
Please Gnar is a champ{{champion:150}}  Rito he is just waitin.
I would main gnar for this skin
i say yes
I would buy this for 3000 RP I like it so much!

Mini-Gnar still looks adorable, but that Mega-Gnar looks FAR more menacing with this skin! More menacing, and more BA (Sorry for any confusion. I tend to censor myself)!! It's almost a shame that I'm not a Gnar player.

> [{quoted}](name=animeboy2428,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=mlkumggI,comment-id=000e,timestamp=2015-03-20T13:51:08.133+0000)
>
> Mini-Gnar still looks adorable, but that Mega-Gnar looks FAR more menacing with this skin! More menacing, and more BA (Sorry for any confusion. I tend to censor myself)!! It's almost a shame that I'm not a Gnar player.

As a gnar player when using a skin for gnar it has to be cute in mini form and fierce in mega form much like his base skin and dino gnar so i think that void gnar would fit gret into his skin colection becasue A: there is only a few void skins such as void fizz B: its cute in mini form cool in mega form and C: Gnar is next in line for skins before him was bel'koz and braum so he shoud  be up next
{{champion:38}} another bug for me to squash
looks nice i would get it
This has to be a thing.

A guy made a post about this before.
But I don't think we need another Void Skin I like his other Idea of Spirit Gnar in which Gnar is a type of spirit animal.

I like this. Void skins are always really cool.
Void Urgot next? That would be cool.

Gnar!

I approve of this!
Oh hell yes

While I do like the idea of this, and it does look Hella cool, there are too many void skins. Honestly, their overwhelming, and ultimately annoying to look at. The purple gets annoying after some time, and I'm sure there are different ideas for Gnar skins out there.
